turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a couple of pizzas from a place called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two cheese, two pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 large thin crust pizzas, 2 cheese, 2 pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And it's going to be for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $96, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That's it. Thank you so much.
